class.name: it.tecnomedia.omap.openmaps
class.designerProperty: Key: BooleanExample, DisplayName: Show Seconds, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True

method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Verifica se l'oggetto sia stato inizializzato.

method.name: _addcircle
method.comment: Adds a circle To the map. Center - Position of the circle center. Radius - Circle radius. StrokeWidth - Stroke width. StrokeColor - Stroke color. FillColor - Inner color. Opacity - Inner color opacity. Value between 0 To 1.

method.name: _addinfowindow
method.comment: Opens an info window with the given HTML content at the specified position.

method.name: _addinfowindow2
method.comment: Opens an info window with the given HTML content at the specified position. It cannot be larger than MaxWidth (in pixels).

method.name: _addmarker
method.comment: Adds a marker to the map.

method.name: _addmarker2
method.comment: Adds a marker To the map with a custom icon. The IconUri must point To an online image Or an image from the assets folder. In the later Case the custom icon will only appear in Release mode. Example: WAIT FOR (gmap.AddMarker2(10, 10, "This is a test", IconUrl)) COMPLETE (MK as Marker) see https://kml4earth.appspot.com/icons.html for icons

method.name: _addmarker2label
method.comment: Adds a marker To the map with a custom icon and label The IconUri must point To an online image Or an image from the assets folder. In the later Case the custom icon will only appear in Release mode. Example: WAIT FOR (gmap.AddMarker2(10, 10, "This is a test", "http:address.ico")) COMPLETE (Mk As Marker)

method.name: _addmarker3
method.comment: Adds a marker To the map with a custom icon. The IconUri must point To an online image Or an image from the assets folder. In the later Case the custom icon will only appear in Release mode. Example: gmap.AddMarker2(10, 10, "This is a test", File.GetUri(File.DirAssets, "SomeIcon.png",32,32)) see https://kml4earth.appspot.com/icons.html for icons

method.name: _addmarker3label
method.comment: Adds a marker To the map with a custom icon and label. The IconUri must point To an online image Or an image from the assets folder. In the later Case the custom icon will only appear in Release mode. Example: gmap.AddMarker2(10, 10, "This is a test", File.GetUri(File.DirAssets, "SomeIcon.png",32,32))

method.name: _addpolygon
method.comment: Adds a polygon To the map. Points - A list Or Array of LatLng points. es. array(array(41.90, 12.49),array(41.80, 12.50),array(41.85, 12.60)) StrokeWidth - Stroke width. StrokeColor - Stroke color. FillColor - Inner color. Opacity - Inner color opacity. Value between 0 To 1.

method.name: _addpolyline
method.comment: Adds a polyline To the map. Points - A list Or Array of LatLng points. Width - Line width. Color - Line color. CloseInfoWindow (InfoWindow As InfoWindow) Closes the specified info window.

method.name: _cameraposition
method.comment: Returns the current camera position. wait for (OM.GetTitle) CameraPosition (cp As CameraPosition)

method.name: _designercreateview
method.comment: Base type must be Object

method.name: _editconfigure
method.comment: Offset -> Map difference; Tollerance -> Editing Poly point

method.name: _editingcircle
method.comment: wait for (OM.EditingCircle(Circle,True)) COMPLETE (Success As Boolean) OR OM.EditingCircle(Circle,True)

method.name: _editingpolygon
method.comment: If an element is already in editing, it is not possible to edit another at the same time. Dim Success As Boolean = OpenMap.EditingPolygon(Polygon,True) Wai For (OpenMaps.EditingPolygon(Polygon, True)) COMPLETE (Success As Boolean)

method.name: _editingpolyline
method.comment: Wait For (OM.EditingPolyline(PolyLine,True)) COMPLETE (Success As Boolean)

method.name: _filtervisiblemapobjects
method.comment: Makes only the objects visible inside the visible map (Bounds)

method.name: _getmapbound
method.comment: wait for (OM.getMapBound) COMPLETE (Bound As Map) Return bound in map format: {"northEast":{"lat":45.123,"lon":12.456},"southWest":{"lat":40.987,"lon":10.321}}

method.name: _getnumberofelements
method.comment: Number Of Elements added wait for (OM.getNumberOfElements) COMPLETE (N As Int)

method.name: _getzoom
method.comment: wait for (OM.getZoom) COMPLETE (Zoom As int)

method.name: _latlontoxy
method.comment: wait for (OM.LatLonToXY(ll)) COMPLETE (XY() As Double) {XY(0) = x (XY(1) = y}

method.name: _loadmkl
method.comment: Return Map as Object Key is ID , Value is Object (Marker,MapPolygon,MapPolyline) WAIT FOR (OpenMap.LoadMKL(Path, FileName)) COMPLETE (ObjectMap As Map)

method.name: _removecircle
method.comment: Removes the specified circle from the map.

method.name: _removemarker
method.comment: Removes the specified marker from the map.

method.name: _removepolygon
method.comment: Removes the specified polygon from the map.

method.name: _removepolyline
method.comment: Removes the specified polyline from the map.

method.name: _setmaptype
method.comment: get or set the zoom level.

method.name: _setzoom
method.comment: Sets the zoom level.

method.name: _updatecirclecenter
method.comment: Update position Radius

method.name: _updatecircleradius
method.comment: New Radius

method.name: _updatemarkerposition
method.comment: update marker posizion

method.name: _updatepolygon
method.comment: NewPoint as List of LatLng

method.name: _updatepolygoncolor
method.comment: Change color

method.name: _updatepolygonfillcolor
method.comment: 1.12 Update FillColor - Opacity 0-1

method.name: _updatepolygonstroke
method.comment: Change StrokeWidth

method.name: _updatepolyline
method.comment: NewPoint as List of LatLng

method.name: _updatepolylinecolor
method.comment: Change color

method.name: _updatepolylinestroke
method.comment: Change StrokeWidth

method.name: _visibleobject
method.comment: es. OpenMap.visibleObject(Polygon.ID)

method.name: _xytolatlng
method.comment: wait for (OM.XYToLatLng(x,y)) COMPLETE (Position As LatLng)

property.name: _mapbound
property.comment: wait for (OM.getMapBound) COMPLETE (Bound As Map) Return bound in map format: {"northEast":{"lat":45.123,"lon":12.456},"southWest":{"lat":40.987,"lon":10.321}}

property.name: _numberofelements
property.comment: Number Of Elements added wait for (OM.getNumberOfElements) COMPLETE (N As Int)

property.name: _maptype
property.comment: get or set the zoom level.

method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Verifica se l'oggetto sia stato inizializzato.

method.name: _addresstolatlon
method.comment: wait for (GMapExt.AddressToLatLon("Address number, City")) COMPLETE (ll as LatLng)

method.name: _bestroutetsp
method.comment: Algoritm Nearest Neighbor points array as LatLng

method.name: _getbearing
method.comment: Returns the bearing between two points, from point1 to point2

method.name: _getdistance
method.comment: Returns the distance between two points in meters

method.name: _getmarkerlabel
method.comment: not available

method.name: _getmarkerposition
method.comment: wait for (OME.GetMarkerPosition) COMPLETE (Position As LatLng)

method.name: _getmarkertitle
method.comment: wait for (OME.GetMarkerTitle) COMPLETE (Title As String)

method.name: _initialize
method.comment: Initializes the object. You can add parameters to this method if needed.

method.name: _latlontoxy
method.comment: wait for (OME.LatLonToXY(ll)) COMPLETE (XY As Double)

method.name: _removemarkerlabel
method.comment: not available Removes the Marker Label for the given Marker

method.name: _routedistance
method.comment: Calcola la distanza totale di un percorso

method.name: _setmarkerclickable
method.comment: Always clickable - not necessary Sets the marker clickable property

method.name: _setmarkericon
method.comment: not available

method.name: _setmarkerlabel
method.comment: not available Sets a MarkerLabel with the given values. Posible color values.

method.name: _setmarkerlabel2
method.comment: not available

method.name: _setmarkerorigin
method.comment: not available Sets the marker origin 'doesn't work!!!

method.name: _setpolygonclickable
method.comment: Always clickable - not necessary Sets the polygon clickable property 'doesn't work!!!

method.name: _xytolatlng
method.comment: Returns the Lat/Lng coordinates for the given screen coordinates 'doesn't work!!! wait for (OME.XYToLatLng(x,y)) COMPLETE (ll As LatLng)
